abilities.name: Fire Breath
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Houndoom is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon (choose 1 if there are 2) is now Burned. This power can't be used if Dark Houndoom is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fire Payback
attacks.text: If you have less Benched Pokémon than your opponent, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
